name: Packing Up
description:
Made for Pizza Game Jam

Controls: Arrow keys moves the head, space drops.

Credits: Thanks to Unity for the engine (https://unity3d.com/), thanks to Google Fonts for the fonts (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Nanum+Myeongjo), Thanks to Blender for the modeling software (https://www.blender.org/), and thanks to LMMS for the music software (https://lmms.io/).

Thanks For Playing!
